cause.description:
The sweeping policy at Concord High School is total crap. If they want us to come to school every day at least make it seem like it's not a prison
1. Locking students out of class is retarded.
2. Giving us detention for being 2 min late is ridiculous.
3. The administrators don't care what we think.
cause.mission: Let Students arive at school when we want to
cause.name: STOP SWEEPING @ CONCORD HIGH
